112:
    a)  0xC19AB000

	1 10000011 00110101011000000000000

	10000011 (2) = 131 (10) = 127 + 4

	1 . 00110101011 x 2^4
	10011. 0101011

	10011 (2) = 19 (10)      0.0101011 (2) = 0.3359375  

	-19,3359375

    b) 0x80580000

	1 00000000 10110000000000000000000
        
        0000000 = 0 = -127 + 127 
        1.10110000000000000000000 X 2^-127

113:
     $f0 = 0x416A0000,    $f0 = 14.625 (10)
	 = 1.110101 x 2^3
	
	0 10000010 11010100000000000000000
        expoente codificado = 10000010 = 130 = 127 + 3 
        1.110101 x 2^3 = 1110. 101
        1110 (2) = 14 (10)
        0.101 (2) = 0.5 + 0.125 = 0.625 (10)


     $f2 = 0xC0C00000    $f2 = -6
	 = 1.1 x 2^2
	
	1 10000001 10000000000000000000000

	expodente codificado = 10000001 = 129 = 127 + 2 
        1.1 x 2^2 = 110 = 6
    

   a)   
	0100 0000 1100 00000000000000000000
        $f4 = 0x40C00000
   
   b)   1100 0001 0110 1010 0000000000000000
	$f6 = 0xC16A0000

   c)   $f0 = 1.110101 x 2^3 (14.625)    $f2 = 1.1 x 2^2 (-6)

	$f0 = 1.110101 x 2^3 		 $f2 = 0.11 x 2^3 	# igualar os expoentes ao maior dos expoentes

	1.110101
       +0.11
       10.100101
	
	10.100101 x 2^3 = 1.0100101 x 2^4 

       1.010011 x 2^4 = 10100.11		10100 (2)=  20 (10)	0.11 (2) = 0.625 (10)

       0100 0001 1010 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000
	0x41A50000
   d)   0xC1A50000    porque (-6 - 14,625 = -(6+14,625))
    
   e)   $f0 = 1.110101 x 2^3 (14.625)    $f2 = 1.1 x 2^2 (-6)  (14.625 - 6)

	$f0 = 1.110101 x 2^3 		 $f2 = 0.11 x 2^3 	# igualar os expoentes ao maior dos expoentes
   
	
	1.110101
       -0.11
        1.000101  x 2^3

        0100 0001 0000 1010 0000000000000000
	0x410A0000

   f)  $f0 = 1.110101 x 2^3 (14.625)    $f2 = 1.1 x 2^2 (-6)  (14.625 - 6)

	expoente somado = 3+2 = 5

        1.110101
       x1.100000
         0000000
        0000000
       0000000
      0000000
     0000000
    1110101
   1110101
  10.101111100000 = 1.0101111100000 x 2^6
      
	1.0101111100000 x 2^6 
	
	1100 0010 1010 1111 1000 0000 
	
      0xC2AF8000 

   g)   ???????????????????????

   h)   ???????????????????????


   i)  $f2 = 0xC0C00000    $f2 = -6
	 = 1.1 x 2^2
	
	1100 0000 0001 1000 000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
	$f20 = 0xC0180000    $f21 = 0x00000000

   j)  $f0 = 0x416A0000,    $f0 = 14.625 (10)
	 = 1.110101 x 2^3
	
	14.625 = 15
       $f22 = 0x0000000F
   
114: ???


115:
        $f2=0x3A600000	     
        0 01110100 11000000000000000000000
	
	expoente codificado = 4+16+32+64 = 116 = 127 - 11
	1.11 *2^-11
	
	$f4=0xBA600000
	1 01110100 11000000000000000000000
        expoente codificado = 4+16+32+64 = 116 = 127 - 11
	-1.11 *2^-11


	sub : 1.11 - (-1.11) = 1.11 + 1.11 = 11.10 *2^-11 = 1.11 *2^-10

       1.11
       1.11
      11.10


116,117,118,119 = SKIP
       0011 1010 1110 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
       $f0 = 0x3AE00000
